div.p:
The Whitesboro Independent School District enters the twenty-first
century encouraging quality, accountability and equity. Quality in
instruction will provide for the needs of productive, effective
and healthy participation in our society.

source.p: To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video
